metadata.name: Perspective
metadata.description:
Personal and social identities give rise to individual and collective perspectives. Should they all be the same? Who decides who the judge, jury and executioner are?                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                   
Hand drawn digital illustration                                                                                                   
Software: Procreate                                                                                                                        
5600 × 6607
